evidence.claim: Common Census utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring the safety of health data.
Common Census integrates with EHR systems through RESTful APIs, supporting HL7 and FHIR standards.
Utilizes PostgreSQL and Redis for data management and caching mechanisms.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of working with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
